title: Add Terms of Use footer section and full Terms of Service page

requirements.summary: Create a new /terms route in the TanStack Router configuration that renders a dedicated TermsOfUsePage component
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /terms renders the Terms of Use page without a 404 or blank screen
The route is registered under the shared Layout root route so the header and footer are visible

file_operations.description: Add a new /terms route to the TanStack Router configuration under the shared Layout root route, following the same pattern as the existing /about route. Import and wire the TermsOfUsePage component.

requirements.summary: Create a TermsOfUsePage component that renders all 14 sections of the Terms of Service exactly as provided, preserving all content verbatim
acceptanceCriteria: All 14 section headings are present and numbered correctly
The opening bold warning paragraph about age requirements is displayed
All bullet lists and sub-sections within each section are rendered completely
ALL-CAPS disclaimer blocks (Sections 4 and 5) are displayed in uppercase
support@stackteacher.com appears as a clickable mailto link
No Stack Teacher branding is missing or replaced with other company names
The copyright line 'Copyright Â© Stack Teacher. All rights reserved.' is present in Section 13

file_operations.description: Create the TermsOfUsePage component containing all 14 sections of the Terms of Service. Include the opening bold warning paragraph about age requirements. Preserve all section headings (numbered 1-14), body text, bullet lists, sub-sections (Feedback, Mandatory Binding Arbitration, Class Action Waiver, Jury Trial Waiver, Small Claims, Emergency Relief, Venue), and ALL-CAPS disclaimer blocks verbatim. Render support@stackteacher.com as a mailto link. Ensure all Stack Teacher branding is preserved and include the copyright line in Section 13. Use semantic HTML with appropriate heading levels and list markup for accessibility.

requirements.summary: Add a Terms of Use link in the site footer next to the existing About Us link
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Terms of Use' link appears in the footer immediately adjacent to the 'About Us' link
Clicking the 'Terms of Use' link navigates to /terms
The link styling is consistent with the existing 'About Us' footer link

file_operations.description: In the footer section containing the About Us link, add a Terms of Use link immediately adjacent to it. The link must navigate to /terms and use consistent styling with the existing About Us link.
